meanings.definition: A person who sells goods or services in small quantities, typically traveling from place to place.
meanings.sent1: The pedlers set up their stalls in the market to sell their handmade crafts.
meanings.sent2: The pedlers walked through the neighborhood selling their fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The pedlers tried to sell ice cream in the middle of winter, which made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pedlers were like busy bees buzzing from one customer to another.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pedlers with their colorful umbrellas was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: To travel around selling goods or services in small quantities.
meanings.sent1: She pedlers her homemade jams at the local farmer's market every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The children pedlers their toys to earn some pocket money.
meanings.sent3: He pedlers his jokes at the office, always bringing smiles to his coworkers.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed from the street performer as he pedlers his songs to the passersby.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread pedlers through the air, drawing in hungry customers.
